content: this is the original pattern from 2015 reposted gir i think he needs a cupcake or a taco or or waffles gir is a little guy that stands at about 9 5 inches from the tips of his ears to his feet he is a very simple pattern with the only fancy stitch being a triple decrease/increase which is just a decrease and an increase across 3 stitches instead of 2 if you have any questions please feel free to ask
